meanings.definition: The tail of an ox, used as meat in cooking.
meanings.sent1: Grandma cooked delicious oxtails for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's specialty is a savory oxtails stew.
meanings.sent3: The oxtails in the soup were so tender, they practically melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of simmering oxtails filled the kitchen with warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The butcher recommended using oxtails for a rich and flavorful broth.

meanings.definition: A dish made with the tail of an ox.
meanings.sent1: I ordered oxtails at the new restaurant to try something different.
meanings.sent2: The oxtails were the highlight of the family reunion feast.
meanings.sent3: The chef's creative twist on oxtails left everyone pleasantly surprised.
meanings.sent4: The oxtails dish was a symphony of flavors that delighted my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The menu featured a tantalizing oxtails recipe that I couldn't resist trying.
